name: DraggableScrollableSheet
desc: A container for a [Scrollable] that responds to drag gestures by resizing the scrollable until a limit is reached, and then scrolling.

fields.name: initialChildSize
fields.desc: The initial fractional value of the parent container's height to use when displaying the widget.

fields.name: minChildSize
fields.desc: The minimum fractional value of the parent container's height to use when displaying the widget.

fields.name: maxChildSize
fields.desc: The maximum fractional value of the parent container's height to use when displaying the widget.

fields.name: expand
fields.desc: Whether the widget should expand to fill the available space in its parent or not.

fields.name: snap
fields.desc: Whether the widget should snap between [snapSizes] when the user lifts their finger during a drag.

fields.name: snapSizes
fields.desc: A list of target sizes that the widget should snap to.

fields.name: snapAnimationDuration
fields.desc: Defines a duration for the snap animations.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: A controller that can be used to programmatically control this sheet.

fields.name: shouldCloseOnMinExtent
fields.desc: Whether the sheet, when dragged (or flung) to its minimum size, should cause its parent sheet to close.

fields.name: builder
fields.desc: The builder that creates a child to display in this widget, which will use the provided [ScrollController] to enable dragging and scrolling of the contents.
